sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; import FlashMsg from "../Partials/FlashMsg"; import "./Overlay.css" import "./PantryList.css" const categories = ["Vegetables", "Fruits", "Grains Pasta", "Dairy", "Meat Poultry", "Fish Eggs", "Fats Oils", "Condiments", "Freezer", "Baking", "Nuts Snacks", "Miscellaneous", "Saved Items"]; const twoWordCats = { "Grains Pasta": "Grains & Pasta", "Fish Eggs": "Fish & Eggs", "Fats Oils": "Fats & Oils", "Meat Poultry": "Meat & Poultry", "Nuts Snacks": "Nuts & Snacks" }; const items = [{name:"Tomato", category: "Vegetables", inStock: true}]; function PantryPage() { const [enteredItems, setEnteredItems] = useState([ {"Vegetables":''}, {"Fruits":''}, {"Grains Pasta":''}, {"Dairy":''}, {"Meat Poultry":''}, {"Fish Eggs":''}, {"Fats Oils":''}, {"Condiments":''}, {"Freezer":''}, {"Baking":''}, {"Nuts Snacks":''}, {"Miscellaneous":''}, {"Saved Items":''}, ]); const [enteredItemCat, setEnteredItemCat] = useState(''); const itemChangeHandler = (event) => { const enteredCat = event.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.firstElementChild.innerText; setEnteredItemCat(enteredCat) enteredItems[enteredItemCat] = event.target.value setEnteredItems(enteredItems); } const newItem = { name: enteredItems[enteredItemCat], category: enteredItemCat, inStock: true } const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(newItem) items.push(newItem); enteredItems[enteredItemCat] = ''; setEnteredItems(enteredItems); }; return (
{categories.map((cat,index) => (
{cat in twoWordCats ? twoWordCats[cat] : cat}
{ items.map((item) => ( (item.category === cat && cat !== "Saved Items" && item.inStock) ? < div class="row list-item-bar m-0" title={cat.toLowerCase() + "-section pantry-category"} >
: (cat === "Saved Items" && !item.inStock) ? < div class="row list-item-bar m-0" title="saved items-section pantry-category" >
: null ))}
))}
); } export default PantryPage;
